metadata.title: CVE-2019-18660 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The Linux kernel before 5.4.1 on powerpc allows Information Exposurebecause the Spectre-RSB mitigation is not in place for all applicable CPUs,aka CID-39e72bf96f58. This is related to arch/powerpc/kernel/entry_64.S andarch/powerpc/kernel/security.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
